name: Reactor

pages.text: A portable nuclear reactor that produces energy. Requires water (or similar fluids) and energy cores. Make sure you connect your machines to it.
Combine a Charger and a Block of Uranium in a Totem Lathe.

pages: Consumes 10 mB of fluids every tick. Each Energy Core lasts 128 ticks. As long as either FE or uranium energies are not full, it will continue producing power.
Each Energy Core produces 640'000 FE and 128 nuclear energy. These are automatically transferred to neighbors if possible.
